text: Widen your horizons with support for all major social networking platforms, you can engage your visitors across all leading portals like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.. Integration of Social media will come soon.
Smart Delegation auto assigns the right conversation to the right team member, based on the type of query raised by the customer, reducing turn-around time and percentage of errors.
24/7 web assistance will provide all your website visitors with smart, automated round-the-clock engagement and assistance with our web messenger service.

In Automatic In-house ticketing, tickets will be raised automatically for all issues stated by customers and they would be assigned to the respective teams, ensuring reduced resolution time and quicker solutions for customers.

Yekaliva have an in-house report generating feature, which allows you to gather all required intelligence by just chatting with it. You will no longer have to wait and rely on a separate BI developer to gather your business intelligence. Have all the data of your whole vast database, broken down into simple reports with just a chat message.
